attributes.background: The death penalty should return to the UK to serve as the ultimate punishment for the most heinous crimes, ensuring justice for victims and their families, deterring potential offenders, and demonstrating that society will not tolerate acts of extreme violence.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357
